text: The Strange One is a 1957 American drama movie. It was directed by Jack Garfein. The movie is based on the book and play End as a Man. Actors include George Peppard, Ben Gazzara, Julie Wilson, Peter Mark Richman, Arthur Storch, and Pat Hingle. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies based on plays Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Strange One
